scripts.buildsync-dev-android: npm run build-dev && NODE_ENV=dev npx cap sync android
scripts.buildsync-dev-ios: npm run build-dev && NODE_ENV=dev npx cap sync ios
scripts.buildrun-dev-android: npm run buildsync-dev-android && NODE_ENV=dev npx cap run android
scripts.buildrun-dev-ios: npm run buildsync-dev-ios && NODE_ENV=dev npx cap run ios
scripts.buildsync-prod-android: npm run build-prod && NODE_ENV=prod npx cap sync android
scripts.buildsync-prod-ios: npm run build-prod && NODE_ENV=prod npx cap sync ios
scripts.buildrun-prod-android: npm run buildsync-prod-android && NODE_ENV=prod npx cap run android
scripts.buildrun-prod-ios: npm run buildsync-prod-ios && NODE_ENV=prod npx cap run ios
